data.title: Casa Lleó Morera BMLD
data.meta_description: The goal of the lighting design project in Casa Lleó i Morera is to drive the visitor into the experience of living at the time, so the design intent will be...
data.text:
The goal of the lighting design project in Casa Lleó i Morera is to drive the visitor into the experience of living at the time, so the design intent will be an approximation of the ancient lighting and create a symbiosis with the contemporary technology to emphasize the rich architectural details that predominate in the tour.

The design intent in this project considers the traditional modernist lighting previously existing and the accent lighting for sculptural details.
